Interrogator: why she was threatened and what was the threat?
Interrogee: So she was threatened that if she does not treat the man who was who needed some kind of heart transplant so the goons will kill... Her family was kept captured, which included her parents, her mom and dad.

Interrogator: Describe what happened when doctors were operating in the OPD.
Interrogee: So while they were operating in the OPD, so this new heart was getting planted, and some wounds come and they pointed a gun at the doctors.

Interrogator: What happened when the male doctor tried to get the ganster out of the OPD?
Interrogee: So the gangster shot and killed.

Interrogator: You said it's female doctor who came out of the OPD?
Interrogee: I never said that it was female doctor. I don't exactly remember what was the gender of the doctor. They were male and female. Both were present, and the one who try to stop him, he was shot by the gangster.

Interrogator: What happened after the group leader shot down the male doctor and both the nurses.
Interrogee: After that they were, what they were doing was there was this one female doctor who was left so the goon who supposedly, was a leader of the gang, went near her and pointed close to her forehead, close to her forehead, forehead, and threatened to kill her too, but his main purpose was to kill the guy who was being operated.

Interrogator: Why the group leader wants to kill that man who was in the operation theater.
What happened after doctor stopped the group leader from shooting the patient?
Interrogee: Yes, so the group leader first tried to stop him, and she first tried to request him not to kill him please that he is her patient, and she being the doctor, and she has taken oath to protect the patient from getting him.

Interrogator: What did the two men who entered the OPD later do to the doctor,
Interrogee: When she was bleeding and nobody was listening to her request, she started attacking the men, and she used the tools which are used while performing the surgery to attack the men, and she used the scissors and stabbed the men. Though the people who were stabbed by the scissors were not killed at that moment, but she knew that if the scissors were taken out, the blood will come out so bad that they will eventually die.

Interrogator: What happened after doctor knocked or the first two men?
Interrogee: After, she knocked out the first two men, the other men, they started like shooting her with the gun. I do not know precisely, I do not remember precisely what happened.

Interrogator: What was the reason for the doctor to protect the patient,
Interrogee: Because he had threatened to kill, his gang members had threatened to kill her family.

Interrogator: But you said that goons are taking her family to kill that man?
Interrogee: No, no. I said the man was getting treated. He was also a member of gang, and his gang members had kept her parents as captured and was threatening to kill her if she didn't operate him.
